TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Sku extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the SKU of an Azure Cognitive Search Service, which determines price tier and capacity limits.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Sku class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Management.Search.Models.SkuName> name) cil managed
Public Sub New (Optional name As Nullable(Of SkuName) = Nothing)

Docs.param: The SKU of the search service. Valid values include: 'free': Shared service. 'basic': Dedicated service with up to 3 replicas. 'standard': Dedicated service with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas. 'standard2': Similar to standard, but with more capacity per search unit. 'standard3': The largest Standard offering with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas (or up to 3 partitions with more indexes if you also set the hostingMode property to 'highDensity'). 'storage_optimized_l1': Supports 1TB per partition, up to 12 partitions. 'storage_optimized_l2': Supports 2TB per partition, up to 12 partitions.'. Possible values include: 'free', 'basic', 'standard', 'standard2', 'standard3', 'storage_optimized_l1', 'storage_optimized_l2'
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Sku class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Name As Nullable(Of SkuName)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the SKU of the search service. Valid values include: 'free': Shared service. 'basic': Dedicated service with up to 3 replicas. 'standard': Dedicated service with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas. 'standard2': Similar to standard, but with more capacity per search unit. 'standard3': The largest Standard offering with up to 12 partitions and 12 replicas (or up to 3 partitions with more indexes if you also set the hostingMode property to 'highDensity'). 'storage_optimized_l1': Supports 1TB per partition, up to 12 partitions. 'storage_optimized_l2': Supports 2TB per partition, up to 12 partitions.'. Possible values include: 'free', 'basic', 'standard', 'standard2', 'standard3', 'storage_optimized_l1', 'storage_optimized_l2'
